properties.publicRemarks: Look no further.  This beautiful home is located in the Panorama subdivision.  Kitchen has been updated and is perfect for those who love to cook. Stainless steel appliances and portable island.  3 bedrooms and 2  remodeled baths rooms.  This beautiful home  has an attached 2 car garage and driveway that will accommodate 2 more vehicles.  It has a fenced front and backyard with an above ground spa.  Beautiful mountain views from the front yard.  Backyard has a covered patio thats ideal for outdoor entertaining with ceiling fans and lights with an above ground hot tub. There is also plenty of room to put in a pool , should you have the need.

properties.publicRemarks: Enjoy all of what Cathedral City has to offer with a rare Desert Oasis with a beautiful private pool & Spa! Lush Mature landscaping surrounding this fabulous family home. Extra-large lot, covered back patio, located on a quiet cul-de-sac, perfect neighborhood. Tile flooring in Livingroom, two dining areas all tile, shutters, ceiling fans, beautiful fireplace, nice granite kitchen, all appliances included. Master bedroom bath leads out to the stunning pool/spa.. Double attached garage. Home features Solar leased. There is plenty of room for everyone with three generously sized bedrooms and a living room. This is the quintessential Desert Oasis experience at its finest. Location is Just 15 minutes from downtown Palm Springs and walking distance to schools, 15 minutes from the international airport.  Super easy to show. Priced perfect..

properties.publicRemarks: PRICE REDUCED - below comp value! Welcome to this special condo in a premier location in the Fairways community of South Palm Springs. You will enjoy fabulous views from almost every room of this 2 bedroom, 2 bath home that has been nicely updated and comes partially furnished with high-end appointments. Sitting on a prime corner lot on a quiet interior cul de sac, you will appreciate having  open green space all around, offering privacy and views galore! This unit was previously updated and has been recently refreshed including paint, new bedroom carpet, re-worked windows & sliders, newer washer/dryer, refrigerator, dishwasher, and more. It's rare to find another 2-bedroom unit in the community with the same unobstructed wraparound views on an interior street with solid, longstanding neighbors. Additionally, there is parking for two; an attached covered carport plus 1-car garage. The Fairways is a meticulously well kept, gated community in South Palm Springs across from the Tahquitz Creek golf course, in close proximity to Trader Joe's, Lowe's, the Palm Springs airport, a variety of upscale dining & shopping, and all the fun downtown Palm Springs has to offer. The HOA is very well funded and offers a newly remodeled clubhouse, tennis & pickleball courts, 8 pools, spa, onsite management plus many other activities and amenities. The new BIA lease is approved until 2071.

properties.publicRemarks:
Charming Home with a Spacious Lot and Prime Location

This 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home offers 1,248 sq. ft. of comfortable living space on an expansive 13,503 sq. ft. lot, providing ample room for outdoor enjoyment.

Inside, the home features a bright living area, a functional kitchen, and a cozy dining space. The primary suite includes a private bath, while two additional bedrooms offer flexibility for guests, a home office, or extra storage.

The backyard is partially landscaped, featuring mature trees and areas of grass, providing a pleasant and private space for outdoor living, entertaining, or gardening. The property also boasts a well-sized front yard and a spacious driveway, offering excellent curb appeal and plenty of parking.

Well-maintained and move-in ready, this home also presents a fantastic opportunity for those looking to personalize and add value.

Located just minutes from downtown Palm Springs, this home offers the perfect blend of space and convenience, with easy access to world-class dining, shopping, entertainment, and outdoor recreation. Additionally, residents of the Dream Homes community will enjoy the brand-new Esperanza Park, a 7.5-acre park featuring multi-use fields, children's play areas, basketball courts, an outdoor fitness area, and scenic picnic spots. This vibrant park will also connect to the CV Link, offering expanded opportunities for walking and biking.

properties.publicRemarks:
Step into classic Palm Springs charm at this 1952 mid-century modern retreat, ideally located just minutes from downtown, top-rated restaurants, and fabulous shopping. This stylish single-family home offers 2 spacious bedrooms, 1 bathroom, an open garage, and all the comfort and convenience you need for the perfect desert escape.

Nestled in the desirable Demuth Park neighborhood, you'll enjoy easy access to green spaces, walking trails, and a nearby dog park—making it an ideal choice for families and pet lovers.

Sitting on a generous 9,147 sq ft lot, there's plenty of room to relax and unwind. Whether you're exploring the vibrant local scene or soaking up the sun in a peaceful setting, this home is the perfect base for your Palm Springs adventure.

Pricing:
🌴 $3,000 per month for long term. 
🌴 We are also open to month to month.
Please reach out to confirm exact pricing for your stay! We can't wait to have you :)

properties.originatingSystemName: Greater Palm Springs Multiple Listing Service
properties.publicRemarks:
This beautifully renovated 2bedroom, 2-bath + den home offers a perfect blend of mid-century charm and modern elegance. Originally designed by renowned architect Richard E. Harrison in 1967, this spacious residence has been thoughtfully updated in 2024, enhancing its appeal while preserving its unique architectural integrity. The open floor-plan, expansive living and dining areas are perfect for entertaining, seamlessly flowing into a versatile den that can adapt to your lifestyle needs. Off the primary suite, you'll find an additional room currently used as a media room, ideal for a home office, yoga studio, or your personal retreat. Enjoy breathtaking Western views that highlight the beauty of the 7Lakes community, complete with a custom fireplace that adds warmth and character to your living space. This exceptional home is a true gem, offering comfort and sophistication in a sought-after location.
The Seven Lakes Golf & Country Club community also known as the 'Gem of the Desert' where in 1968 President Eisenhower sank his only hole-in-one on the 13th hole of the Ted Robinson designed golf course. Community amenities include: 24-hour guard at gate, 15 pools/spas all heated at season, pickleball court, onsite HOA and sales office, electric car charging stations and famous William Cody designed clubhouse with restaurant/bar.
